description.fr:
Retire la {PropertyEffect:6[PÉTRIFICATION]} d'{%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME}, puis lui inflige {value:dmg,percent} de sa {%PVMAX}.
\---
Applique {PropertyEffect:101} à tous les {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} pour le tour.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.en:
Removes {PropertyEffect:6[PETRIFICATION]} from the targeted {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} then inflicts {value:dmg,percent} of their {%PVMAX} on them.
\---
Applies {PropertyEffect:101} on all {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME,plural:other} for the turn.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.es:
Retira la {PropertyEffect:6[PETRIFICACIÓN]} de {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME}, luego le inflige {value:dmg,percent} de su {%PVMAX}.
\---
Aplica {PropertyEffect:101} a todos los {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} durante el turno.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.de:
Entfernt die {PropertyEffect:6[VERSTEINERUNG]} von {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} und verursacht bei ihm {value:dmg,percent} seiner {%PVMAX} als Schaden.
\---
Wendet {PropertyEffect:101} bei allen {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} für die Runde an.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.pt:
Retira a {PropertyEffect:6[PETRIFICAÇÃO]} do {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} e inflige {value:dmg,percent} dos seus {%PVMAX} a ele.
\---
Aplica {PropertyEffect:101} a todos os {%FAMILY_CRAQUELEUR_NAME} durante o turno.
\---
{%DestroyOnPlayed}
